turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I'm great. Almost done at work and want to order some pizzas for pickup from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds like a nice evening, how many pizzas did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to get four medium pizzas with gluten-free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what toppings would you like on them?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Two with onions and tomatoes and the other two with chicken.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's 4 medium gluten free pizzas 2 with onion and tomatoes, and the other two are chicken and bbq.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total is 68 44, is that all for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, go ahead and place that order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, it'll be ready for pickup in 30 minutes, have a great day!
